public class Trusty

simple control program for a moving robot that can back off.

Method Detail

run

public void run()
m1, m2 run forward. if e3 (or e4) is open, back off, turn away, and go forward again.

turn

protected void turn(Controller.Output a,
                    Controller.Output b,
                    Controller.Input t)
use impulse counter to back off, turn away from motor a.
